column1: "description": "The Gross Enrollment Ratio (GER) is defined as the percentage of enrollment in Primary (Classes I-V) and Upper Primary (Classes- VI-VIII) and I-VIII to the estimated child population in the age groups of 6 to less than 11 years and 11 to less than 14 years and or 6 to less than 14 years
"title": "Download CSV for Gross Enrollment Ratio at Primary Upper Primary and Elementary level"
